messages.message: Invalid colorModel in basic DFD block for RGB vkFormat.
messages.details: DFD block #1 colorModel in basic DFD block is KHR_DF_MODEL_CIEXYZ but for vkFormat VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM it must be KHR_DF_MODEL_RGBSDA.

messages.message: Invalid channelType for colorModel in basic DFD block.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample #3 in basic DFD block specifies channel (0xF) which is not valid for color model KHR_DF_MODEL_CIEXYZ.
